quotes: Never settle for the crumbs of life.
You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
There are no constraints on the human mind, no walls around the human spirit, no barriers to our progress except those we ourselves erect.
If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
A fool sees himself as another, but a wise man sees others as himself.
Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
When you love someone, you love the person as they are, and not as you'd like them to be.
Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
To arrive at the simplest truth requires years of contemplation.
It is best to begin at the beginning.
The farther backward you can look, the farther forward you are likely to see.
Be where your enemy is not.
Man must use what he has, not hope for what is not.
Act the way you want to be and soon you'll be the way you act.
There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
A clear conscience never fears midnight knocking.
When the fish is caught we pay no more attention to the trap.
Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
A change is brought about because ordinary people do extraordinary things.
To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
I was wise enough to never grow up while fooling most people into believing I had.
One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
The happiest people in the world are those who feel absolutely terrific about themselves.
Success is not to be pursued, it is to be attracted by the person you become.
The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.
Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness but it is greatness.
Nothing important is learned; it is simply remembered.
Well done is better than well said.
Conflict cannot survive without your participation.
The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.
I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
Learning never exhausts the mind.
Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself.
We think too much and feel too little.
We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness inside that holds whatever we want.
The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned.
If you can change your mind, you can change your life.
To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.
It's easier to lose than to win.
The man who moved the mountain was the one who began carrying away the smallest stones.
If you don't make things happen then things will happen to you.
Things cannot forever go downward. There are limits to everything?even the cold, and the darkness, and the wind, and the dying.
